info.description: The SAP HANA on Azure Management Client.
info.title: HanaManagementClient

get.description: Gets a list of SAP HANA management operations.

items.description: HANA operation information

description.description: The localized friendly description for the operation as shown to the user. This description should be thorough, yet concise. It will be used in tool-tips and detailed views.

operation.description: The localized friendly name for the operation as shown to the user. This name should be concise (to fit in drop downs), but clear (self-documenting). Use Title Casing and include the entity/resource to which it applies.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; governs the display of the operation in the RBAC UX and the audit logs UX. Default value is 'user,system'

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name. This form is also expected to include the publisher/company responsible. Use Title Casing. Begin with "Microsoft" for 1st party services.

resource.description: The localized friendly form of the resource type related to this action/operation. This form should match the public documentation for the resource provider. Use Title Casing. For examples, refer to the “name” section.

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object. This name should match the action name that appears in RBAC / the event service.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a list of SAP HANA instances in the specified subscription. The operations returns various properties of each SAP HANA on Azure instance.

parameters.description: Subscription ID which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

schema.description: The response from the List HANA Instances operation.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of HANA instances.

value.description: The list of SAP HANA on Azure instances.

items.description: HANA instance info on Azure (ARM properties and HANA properties)

hanaInstanceId.description: Specifies the HANA instance unique ID.

hardwareProfile.description: Specifies the hardware settings for the HANA instance.

hardwareType.description: Name of the hardware type (vendor and/or their product name)

hwRevision.description: Hardware revision of a HANA instance

networkProfile.description: Specifies the network settings for the HANA instance.

circuitId.description: Specifies the circuit id for connecting to express route.

networkInterfaces.description: Specifies the network interfaces for the HANA instance.

items.description: Specifies the IP address of the network interface.

ipAddress.description: Specifies the IP address of the network interface.

osProfile.description: Specifies the operating system settings for the HANA instance.

computerName.description: Specifies the host OS name of the HANA instance.

osType.description: This property allows you to specify the type of the OS.

storageProfile.description: Specifies the storage settings for the HANA instance disks.

nfsIpAddress.description: IP Address to connect to storage.

osDisks.description: Specifies information about the operating system disk used by the hana instance.

items.description: Specifies the disk information fo the HANA instance

diskSizeGB.description: Specifies the size of an empty data disk in gigabytes.

lun.description: Specifies the logical unit number of the data disk. This value is used to identify data disks within the VM and therefore must be unique for each data disk attached to a VM.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.
